pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, February 14, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, February 14, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the national caucus meeting.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a speech in the House of Commons on the recognition and implementation of Indigenous rights.
